Ignore articles (terms such as \"The\" a: Ignore articles (terms such as "The" and "A") when sorting lists
Failed to connect to websockets: Failed to connect to websockets, so I am falling back to polling for updates. Which makes things slower and uses more resources. Please ensure you have 'Allow programs on other systems to control Kodi' ENABLED in the Kodi settings (System > Services > Remote control). You may also get this if you are using proxies or accessing via an IP addess when localhost will suffice. If websockets normally works, you might just need to refresh your browser.
Switch between Kodi and local playback v: Switch between Kodi and local playback via the tabs. You can toggle visibility with the arrow in the top right
